name: Young Copper Dragon
senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 15

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon attacks with its bite and twice with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

actions.name: Acid Breath
actions.desc: The dragon exhales acid in a 40-foot-long  5-foot wide-line. Each creature in the area makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw  taking 45 (10d8) acid damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

actions.name: Slowing Breath
actions.desc: The dragon exhales toxic gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw  becoming slowed for 1 minute on a failure. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on itself on a success.

special_abilities.name: Flow Within the Mountain
special_abilities.desc: The dragon has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in mountainous regions.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The dragons spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. 3/day each:hideous laughter, suggestion
